summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Human Services Department, authorizing an agreement with the Washington State Department of Social and Health Services, Aging and Adult Services Administration for financial assistance to support a program to provide support services to individuals providing unpaid in-home care to older and disabled individuals, creating a position, increasing an expenditure allowance in the 2001 budget of the Human Services Department by a reimbursable appropriation, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Human Services, Education and Civil Rights
